title: Pre-Game Goes Live
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is in the app and inside a game
AND the game is in a PRE-GAME state
custom_steps: WHEN the game time is reached
custom_expected:
THEN a card saying "It's game time!" should be displayed at the bottom of the deck of pre-game props
AND when the first batters are at bat, a "TOP 1" card should be displayed, followed by the "Batter Up", "On Deck", and "In the Hole" batter props
AND the time at the top of the card should change to a display of the bases, number of outs, and have "TOP 1" displayed above it
